posts.post_content:
Posted By: B O'Brien
Selling off a couple of the Piedmont Factory 42's to raise some funds to add another VG HOFer/interesting character to the little backs lot that I have going.
The Matty is fresh from SGC (10 Poor).  Mathewson looks great for the grade, just a divet on the back that cuts through the bottom of the NY, but you don't notice it if just glancing at it.  The color and resolution are crisp.  You can see the twinkle in his eyes!
Delivered prices:
Mathewson: No longer availible
Chance: SOLD


Thanks,
Bob
email at upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com
